channel.set: Log messages will now be sent to {{channel}}

switches.author: Log type switches
switches.desc:
Green button color - log type is **active**
Red button color - log type is **inactive**
switches.footer: Click the button to toggle the log type ON or OFF

lobby.channelSet: Private channels lobby has been set to {{channel}}
lobby.channelOff: Private channels lobby has been removed

autoRole.position: You can't set an autorole that is higher or the same as yours

ticket.defaultDesc: Press the button below to create a new ticket
ticket.initCreated: Ticket initial message was successfully created!

cooldown.invalidTime:
Specified value `{{value}}` is not a correct time
Cooldown cannot be less than 15 seconds or greater than 5 minutes.
Time should end with s/m to specify seconds and minutes
